page.title: 20Lifestyle in Verwood.
page.content: There is an{Off Licence,}1{licenced {restaurant}and 3{Public Houses.}There are 4{social clubs,}1 of which is at the{Leisure Centre,}where activities for all ages are organised. 2 mens and 3 ladies{hairdressers}are in existence, with a{beauty parlour attached to 1. The{Memorial Hall stands in the{recreation ground. {Project Contibutors aged 8/9 yrs are:- A.Bruce C.Bryant B.Buckley P.Child L.Cochran A.Coley Z.Collins K.Davies J.Easdown K.Emerson N.Fletcher C.Frost J.Harding W.Harvey N.Irving P.King U.Kirby C.Little K.Martin N.Morris N.O'Shea L.Probert K.Ramsbottom J.Smith K.Smith W.Stevens A.Strong J.Turner S.Waugh L.Williams A.Withington {Also-}I&D.Imlach,P.Reeks & S.Clifton.
